content.p: Student life at Nottingham Life in Nottingham isn't just about your studies - as a new student there is so much more to explore. Whether you're looking to complement your studies with a placement or extra modules, join a sports group, pick up a new hobby, or just want a bit of support with day-to-day university life, you'll find what you need on the pages below. University isn't just about the classroom - make the most of your time here Everything you need to help you succeed with your studies and develop your skills We're here to help you throughout every step of your student journey, whatever you might need To stay up to date with what's happening on and around campus, make sure you connect with our social media channels for current students: Instagram Facebook group
